name: Tears of fish
description:
This is a maze game where a handsome armored warrior accidentally enters a mysterious maze. Here, you can see golden walls everywhere. You need to find your way out of the maze as soon as possible, otherwise the game will fail. We need to guide the light into the lighthouse in the maze map, which means that the conditions for completing the game are not just about reaching the finish line.

3D perspective can give you an immersive feeling, and relaxed music can bring you a joyful atmosphere, making you eager to try. Come and challenge this maze adventure.
